channel.title: CiTR -- Besneric Rhyme (2007)
channel.description: Each week, a new poem and a new poetic activity; donut > eating, bus riding, insect extermination, and the invitational you.
channel.itunes:summary: Each week, a new poem and a new poetic activity; donut > eating, bus riding, insect extermination, and the invitational you.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver

item.title: April 24th, 2007
item.description: STeven Price discusses a poem from Anatomy of Keys, his book of poems about Houdini.
item.itunes:subtitle: Steven Price

item.title: April 17th, 2007
item.description: Ken babstock discusses his poem "A Setting To," along with construction sites and theories of mind.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ken Babstock

item.title: Besneric Rhyme April 10th, 2007
item.description: Bren Simmers' poem "Red Light"; we take it on the B-Line Express bus
item.itunes:subtitle: Bren Simmers

item.title: Besneric Rhyme April 3rd, 2007
item.description: Ben Hart and Linda Besner go on the Great Donut Tour of Vancouver to discuss Ben's sonnet cycle about donuts.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ben Hart

item.title: Besneric Rhyme March 20th, 2007
item.description: Amanda Lamarche discusses her poem "Drawing the Ear". She also draws the ear.
item.itunes:subtitle: Amanda Lamarche

item.title: Besneric Rhyme March 13, 2007
item.description: True False questions about Dean Young's poem "True/False"
item.itunes:subtitle: Dean Young

item.title: Besneric Rhyme March 6, 2007
item.description: Zach Wells and I discuss his poem "The Exterminator's Song to the Silverfish" and spray bedbugs in my apartment.
item.itunes:subtitle: Zach Wells
